name: The Caspian Console
description: Contemporary minimalism is at the heart of the Caspian console design with its sleek, slimline features and sense of open space with its dark finish to accentuate its form and draw the eye. A simple statement of what can be achieved by perfect proportion, clean lines and a juxtaposition of curves and angles, available in any of Davidson's luxury timber and lacquer finishes. Inject a dose of glamour by a shimmering shade of gold leaf to the inner pedestal in white gold, moon gold or yellow gold options. The Caspian has a wide curve and a sharp, angular base combine to create a slick-looking structure that is available in range of sizes, an essential to any dining, living room or bedroom furniture collection.
